column4: hi, I having problems to connect to the internet. When I click the small network icon on upper right corner there is no eth0 connected is this normal? What is happening?
clean install ? i had a similar problem at one point I needed to disable ipv6 in the network comf
I do no remember of any error message during installation ...

it doesn'T show as a problem during install, it just enables ipv6 and that's a problem when you get to trying to connect,  just go in the network manager thingy look around and if you see ipv6 enabled uncheck it or someting
